beliefs.text: Information arriving one hour early is worth more than a province.
The Senate is a theater for ugly people to pretend they are noble.
Everyone has a price; the question is whether you can afford it.

desires.text: Crush the Asian tax contract auction before news of the Pontic revolt reaches the Forum.
Humiliate Quintus Fabius without technically breaking the law.

visual_dna.physical: A man in his late 50s with a sharp, hawkish nose and deep-set weary eyes. Clean-shaven with short-cropped gray hair. Lean, wiry build suggesting restless energy.
visual_dna.costume_default: A short working tunic in undyed wool, deliberately plain. A single iron ring on his left hand. Leather sandals, road-worn.
visual_dna.distinguishing_marks: A thin scar across his right palm (old knife wound). Ink stains on his fingertips.
visual_dna.posture_energy: Always in motion—pacing, drumming fingers, checking sight lines. Never fully relaxed.

beliefs.text: Profit without labor is a cancer on the Republic.
My wife is the only thing keeping this house standing.
The ancestors watch and judge every action.

desires.text: Secure the Consulship to restore the family name.
Find the 'smoking gun' ledger that links Varo to the pirate bribes.

tells: refuses to look at gold coins

visual_dna.physical: A man in his mid-40s with a broad, honest face showing the strain of principle. Strong Roman features—pronounced nose, heavy brow. Dark hair with distinguished gray at temples.
visual_dna.costume_default: A proper toga praetexta with purple border. Always formally dressed. Wears his grandfather's signet ring.
visual_dna.distinguishing_marks: Scar on left forearm from military service. Slight squint in right eye.
visual_dna.posture_energy: Studied dignity. Moves with deliberate formality. Stands straighter when challenged.

beliefs.text: Men differ only in the price of their toys.
Varo is a sharp blade; Quintus is a heavy shield. I need both.
Emotion is information about yourself you give away for free.

desires.text: Prevent Quintus from discovering my investment portfolio managed by Varo.
Maintain the household's financial stability regardless of Quintus's crusade.

visual_dna.physical: A woman in her early 40s with sharp aristocratic features—high cheekbones, straight nose, strong jaw. Cool gray eyes. Dark hair pulled back severely, streaked with early silver.
visual_dna.costume_default: An elegant stola in deep blue or charcoal gray, always perfectly draped. Gold pins at the shoulders. Minimal jewelry.
visual_dna.distinguishing_marks: Small mole above left eyebrow. Calloused fingertips from writing.
visual_dna.posture_energy: Perfect stillness as a weapon. Economical movements. Never gestures unnecessarily.

beliefs.text: Varo knows where the bodies are buried because he put them there.
The courts are just another market where the highest bidder wins.

desires.text: Survive the coming storm without losing everything.
Get my family out of Rome before the investigation closes in.

beliefs.text: Every problem is a negotiation waiting to happen.
Varo is the future; the old families are the past.

desires.text: Position myself as indispensable to whoever wins the Varo-Fabius conflict.
Acquire a Senate seat through any means necessary.
